alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 4:20AM PST until March 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches, except 1 to 5 inches below 1500 feet. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The combination of heavy, wet snow and gusty wind could result in falling tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to an inch per hour above 1000 feet will be possible late Friday night through Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
